name: Loncor Gold Inc.
longDescription: Loncor Gold Inc is a gold exploration and project development company with projects in the North East of the DRC. Elements of management have had 25 years of exposure to the DRC. The company is focused on expanding the 3.66M oz Adumbi resource, 220kms from Africa's largest gold producer, the Kibali Mine. In December 2021 a PEA on Adumbi produced an NPV@5% of US$624M after tax using US$1600/oz. Loncor owns 84.68% of Adumbi, the DRC Government owns 10% with a mining permit already in place.
